About the Company: Jainco Projects (India) Ltd was originally incorporated on October 30, 1991 under the name of Jainco Construction Company with the main objective of carrying on the business of construction, housing and investment in shares and securities. In February 1994, the company envisaged the idea of expansion of its present business and diversifying into the areas of finance, leasing & financial Services and accordingly the name of the company was changed to Jainco Projects (India) on March 2, 1994 and a fresh Certificate of Incorporation consequent on change of name was obtained.
